column1: The Pit Room////A bit overrated in my opinion
column2: I got the 3 meat platter with ribs
column4: and a side of Mac and cheese and potato salad. The smoked chicken was the best part of the meal
column5: the potato salad was second. The brisket was not as tender as I would have hoped
column6: based on the reviews. And the ribs were fatty and just OK.
